Oh, that the leading men in the Office would practice the teachings of Christ Jesus! Colossians 4. "Continue in prayer, and watch in the same with thanksgiving." "Let your speech be alway with grace, seasoned with salt, that ye may know how ye ought to answer every man." Colossians 4:2, 6. "Who is a wise man and endued with knowledge among you?" James 3:13-18. The Lord Jesus Christ says,
